long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This will take unformatted json string as input and give formatted json string as output.
Example:
Before
---------------------------------------------------------------
{"f_name":"Rohit", "l_name":"Moga",  "age":26, "car":null}

After
---------------------------------------------------------------
{
  "f_name": "Rohit",
  "l_name": "Moga",
  "age": 26,
  "car": null
}
